name: Arc'teryx Lefroy 11in Shorts - Men's
description:
Shorts that stand up to summer hikes and treks. A nylon blend provides stretch for high-stepping on rugged trails, and is quick to dry after an unexpected stream dip or after a camp laundry load.Lightweight nylon fabric has plenty of stretch.Full zip fly and snap closure.Plenty of pockets keep trail essentials close at hand.Gusseted crotch and for comfort and mobility.

        Sustainability
